# Right Atrial/CVP Waveform

## Jugular Venous Pulsation

-   3 "waves" of JVP
    -   a wave
        -   rise in RAP during atrial contraction
    -   c wave
        -   bowing of TV into RA during systole
    -   v waves
        -   RA filling while the TV is closed
-   2 "descents"
    -   x descent
    -   y descent
